      • createFigure

        private Figure createFigure​(int menu,
                            Color color,
                            Color background)
                     throws IllegalFigureCreationException
        Creates a figure according to the selection, color and background
        Parameters:
        menu - Selection of the menu which decides what figure will be created
        color - Color of the body of the figure
        background - Color of the background of the figure
        Returns:
        The figure selected
        Throws:
        IllegalFigureCreationException - Controls the color and the background to be different
